title: The latest on 'Mass. and Cass' and what state support could look like for the area
dc:creator: WBUR
description: WBUR reporter Deborah Becker spent the day in the area on Monday, and talks with us about what she saw. Plus, state Sen. Nick Collins, who represents the 1st Suffolk District, joins us to discuss what state aid could or should look like.
